titleStmt.title: A sober discourse of the honest cavalier with the popish couranter wherein the author of the Dialogue between the Pope and fanatick vindicates himself to be an hearty lover of his prince and countrey : to which is annexed, A serious epistle to Hodge / by a person of quality.
titleStmt.author: Onslow, Richard Onslow, Baron, 1654-1717.

titleStmt.title: A sober discourse of the honest cavalier with the popish couranter wherein the author of the Dialogue between the Pope and fanatick vindicates himself to be an hearty lover of his prince and countrey : to which is annexed, A serious epistle to Hodge / by a person of quality.
titleStmt.author: Onslow, Richard Onslow, Baron, 1654-1717.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to R. Onslow. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
"A serious epistle to Hodge" has special t.p., but text (p. 23-33) is lacking on film.

person.persName: Hearty lover of his prince and country.
Hearty lover of his prince and country.
